QuestData.Title: Barreling Along
QuestData.Description: No, no, no, don't you worry about pickin' 'em up. I can hold these here barrels.$b$bI may not be the handsomest pandaren, or the smartest, or any fun to be around in the slightest, but I'm stronger than a mushan beast.$b$bI'mma just need you to lead the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lead Mudmug back to Halfhill.$b$bIf you become separated from Mudmug, you can find him next to the giant banana in the Gilded Fan.
